about.name: The following questions are from real DMV written tests. These are some of the actual permit questions you will face in California. Each permit practice test question has three answer choices. Select one answer for each question and select "grade this section." You can find this button at the bottom of the drivers license quiz.  For a complete list of questions and answers for California please visit https://cheat-sheets.dmv-written-test.com/en/california/car.

hasPart.name: It is illegal for a person 21 years of age or older to drive with a blood alcohol concentration (BAC) that is ____ or higher.

about.name: It is illegal for a person 21 years of age or older to drive with a blood alcohol concentration (BAC) that is ____ or higher.

hasPart.assesses: It is illegal for a person 21 years of age or older to drive with a blood alcohol concentration (BAC) that is ____ or higher. | It is illegal for a person 21 years of age or older to drive with a blood alcohol concentration (BAC) that is ____ or higher. -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: For drivers age 21 or older, it is illegal to drive with a blood alcohol concentration (BAC) of 0.08 percent or higher. Driving while under the influence of alcohol is not only illegal, but dangerous.

comment.text: 0.08% -- Eight-hundredths of one percent
0.10% -- One-tenth of one percent
0.05% -- Five-hundredths of one percent
0.08% -- Eight-hundredths of one percent

answerExplanation.text: For drivers age 21 or older, it is illegal to drive with a blood alcohol concentration (BAC) of 0.08 percent or higher. Driving while under the influence of alcohol is not only illegal, but dangerous.

comment.text: It is illegal for a person 21 years of age or older to drive with a blood alcohol concentration (BAC) that is ____ or higher. | For drivers age 21 or older, it is illegal to drive with a blood alcohol concentration (BAC) of 0.08 percent or higher. Driving while under the influence of alcohol is not only illegal, but dangerous.

hasPart.name: You consent to take a chemical test for the alcohol content of your blood, breath, or urine:

about.name: You consent to take a chemical test for the alcohol content of your blood, breath, or urine:

hasPart.assesses: You consent to take a chemical test for the alcohol content of your blood, breath, or urine: | You consent to take a chemical test for the alcohol content of your blood, breath, or urine: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: By driving in California, you consent to have your breath, blood, or urine tested if you are arrested for suspicion of driving under the influence of alcohol and/or drugs.

suggestedAnswer.text: Only if you have been drinking alcohol.

comment.text: Only if you have been drinking alcohol.
Whenever you drive in California.

suggestedAnswer.text: Only if you have a collision.

comment.text: Only if you have a collision.
Whenever you drive in California.

hasPart.name: When should drivers yield the right-of-way to pedestrians in a crosswalk?

about.name: When should drivers yield the right-of-way to pedestrians in a crosswalk?

hasPart.assesses: When should drivers yield the right-of-way to pedestrians in a crosswalk? | When should drivers yield the right-of-way to pedestrians in a crosswalk? -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Bring your vehicle to a complete stop at a crosswalk to yield the right-of-way to any vehicle or pedestrian already in the intersection. You may carefully proceed if your lane is completely clear.

suggestedAnswer.text: Only if the pedestrians first wave to the driver.

comment.text: Only if the pedestrians first wave to the driver.

suggestedAnswer.text: Only if the pedestrians are not texting while walking.

comment.text: Only if the pedestrians are not texting while walking.
At all times.
At all times.

answerExplanation.text: Bring your vehicle to a complete stop at a crosswalk to yield the right-of-way to any vehicle or pedestrian already in the intersection. You may carefully proceed if your lane is completely clear.

comment.text: When should drivers yield the right-of-way to pedestrians in a crosswalk? | Bring your vehicle to a complete stop at a crosswalk to yield the right-of-way to any vehicle or pedestrian already in the intersection. You may carefully proceed if your lane is completely clear.

hasPart.name: You must look for bicyclists in the same lanes used by motor vehicles because they:

about.name: You must look for bicyclists in the same lanes used by motor vehicles because they:

hasPart.assesses: You must look for bicyclists in the same lanes used by motor vehicles because they: | You must look for bicyclists in the same lanes used by motor vehicles because they: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Bicyclists have the right to operate on the road and may lawfully be permitted to ride on certain sections of freeways where there is no alternate route and bicycling is not forbidden by a sign. Watch for bicyclists and share the road when they are present.

comment.text: Must ride facing oncoming traffic.

suggestedAnswer.text: Illegally share lanes with motor vehicles.

comment.text: Illegally share lanes with motor vehicles.

suggestedAnswer.text: Are entitled to share the road with motor vehicles.

comment.text: Are entitled to share the road with motor vehicles.

acceptedAnswer.text: Are entitled to share the road with motor vehicles.

comment.text: Are entitled to share the road with motor vehicles.

answerExplanation.text: Bicyclists have the right to operate on the road and may lawfully be permitted to ride on certain sections of freeways where there is no alternate route and bicycling is not forbidden by a sign. Watch for bicyclists and share the road when they are present.

comment.text: You must look for bicyclists in the same lanes used by motor vehicles because they: | Bicyclists have the right to operate on the road and may lawfully be permitted to ride on certain sections of freeways where there is no alternate route and bicycling is not forbidden by a sign. Watch for bicyclists and share the road when they are present.

hasPart.name: Slowing down just to look at collisions or anything else out-of-the-ordinary:

about.name: Slowing down just to look at collisions or anything else out-of-the-ordinary:

hasPart.assesses: Slowing down just to look at collisions or anything else out-of-the-ordinary: | Slowing down just to look at collisions or anything else out-of-the-ordinary: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Avoid "rubbernecking," or slowing down to look at collisions or anything else out-of-the-ordinary. This helps to relieve traffic congestion.

comment.text: Causes traffic congestion.
Prevents rear-end collisions.

suggestedAnswer.text: Improves traffic flow by preventing collisions.

comment.text: Improves traffic flow by preventing collisions.
Causes traffic congestion.

answerExplanation.text: Avoid "rubbernecking," or slowing down to look at collisions or anything else out-of-the-ordinary. This helps to relieve traffic congestion.

hasPart.name: A steady green traffic light at an intersection means:

about.name: A steady green traffic light at an intersection means:

hasPart.assesses: A steady green traffic light at an intersection means: | A steady green traffic light at an intersection means: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: A steady green traffic light indicates that the driver may continue through the intersection. The driver should yield to traffic or pedestrians already in the intersection and proceed when the intersection is clear.

comment.text: Increase your speed.
Adjust your mirrors.

suggestedAnswer.text: You may continue through the intersection at a safe and reasonable speed, if it is clear to do so.

comment.text: You may continue through the intersection at a safe and reasonable speed, if it is clear to do so.

acceptedAnswer.text: You may continue through the intersection at a safe and reasonable speed, if it is clear to do so.

comment.text: You may continue through the intersection at a safe and reasonable speed, if it is clear to do so.

answerExplanation.text: A steady green traffic light indicates that the driver may continue through the intersection. The driver should yield to traffic or pedestrians already in the intersection and proceed when the intersection is clear.

comment.text: A steady green traffic light at an intersection means: | A steady green traffic light indicates that the driver may continue through the intersection. The driver should yield to traffic or pedestrians already in the intersection and proceed when the intersection is clear.
